name: The Call of the West
description: Bored of life in the east coast Abby sets out for adventures and goes west to find a place in the world.  Help guide Abby on her journey. Travel back to the times of the old west. As you make your way through the world of the west be sure to help neighbors along the way. The choices you make will affect your outcome. Gain or lose karma points depending on what choices you make!
